name: The Way Of The Huntress
description:
The Way Of The Huntress is a runner/action/platform game inspired by Bittrip Runner, Bionic Commando, Katana Zero.

 ____________________________________________________________________________________

Instructions

  • Jump/Start Running:                     Space
  • Throw Grappling Hook:               I              /           UpArrow
  • Melee Attack:                                    O            /           LeftArrow
  • Ranged Attack:                                 P             /           RightArrow

 _____________________________________________________________________________________

Credits

  • Code and Design by Hekfhull (Semih Dincer)
  • Art by Luiz Melo, Szadi Art, Kronovi, Gian Man Super, Kenney
  • Music by LHS Chiptunes
  • Fonts by Javier Ugarte
  • SFX by Cabled_mess
  • SFX Softwares: GMXR (by Wubs), Chiptone (by SFB Games)
